## Quaternion.Hermite() method

Interpolate between two quaternions using Hermite interpolation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Hermite(value1: ReadOnlyQuaternion, tangent1: ReadOnlyQuaternion, value2: ReadOnlyQuaternion, tangent2: ReadOnlyQuaternion, amount: number): Quaternion;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value1 | <code>ReadOnlyQuaternion</code> | defines first quaternion |
|  tangent1 | <code>ReadOnlyQuaternion</code> | defines the incoming tangent |
|  value2 | <code>ReadOnlyQuaternion</code> | defines second quaternion |
|  tangent2 | <code>ReadOnlyQuaternion</code> | defines the outgoing tangent |
|  amount | <code>number</code> | defines the target quaternion |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Quaternion`

the new interpolated quaternion
